timing: Five days during Kartik month (October-November), specifically on new moon (Amavasya)
description: The festival celebrating Rama's return to Ayodhya after 14 years of exile and his victory over Ravana. Celebrated with lights, fireworks, sweets, and worship of Lakshmi.
steps: Ritual bathing and dressing in new clothes
Worship of Lakshmi (goddess of wealth and prosperity)
